channel.title: Career on Hack Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Career on Hack Engineering

item.title: I want to keep creating valuable things with my own hands - a turning point that I grasped with dev-sumi and a resolve as an engineer
item.description: This is an English version of my career interview Developers’ event “Developers Summit” to be held in Meguro Gajyo every February, so-called “dev-sami”. Various sessions will be held, but how can we use what we got there? This time I talked to Mr. Takatomo Honda of freee Co., Ltd., which had a career turning point as a result of participation in Developers Summit 2016. As an engineer I always wanted to creating things with my own hands - First of all I will ask about my career.
